00029 /* Creation flag. */
00030 #define I_AUTOENA    XN_ISR_ENABLE /* Auto-enable interrupt channel
00031                                       after each IRQ. */
00032 #define I_PROPAGATE  XN_ISR_CHAINED /* Propagate IRQs down the
00033                                        pipeline after processing; IOW,
00034                                        pass them to Linux. */
00035 typedef struct rt_intr_info {
00036 
00037     unsigned irq;       /* !< Interrupt request number. */
00038 
00039     unsigned long hits; /* !< Number of receipts (since attachment). */
00040 
00041     char name[XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN]; /* !< Symbolic name. */
00042 
00043 } RT_INTR_INFO;

00059 typedef struct rt_intr {
00060 
00061     unsigned magic;   /* !< Magic code - must be first */
00062 
00063     xnholder_t link;    /* !< Link in global interrupt queue. */
00064 
00065 #define link2intr(laddr) \
00066 ((RT_INTR *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((RT_INTR *)0)->link)))
00067 
00068     xnintr_t intr_base;   /* !< Base interrupt object. */
00069 
00070     void *private_data; /* !< Private user-defined data. */
00071 
00072     rt_handle_t handle; /* !< Handle in registry -- zero if unregistered. */
00073 
00074     char name[XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN]; /* !< Symbolic name. */
00075 
00076 #if defined(__KERNEL__) && defined(CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE)

00083

00085 
00086 #endif /* __KERNEL__ && CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
00087 
00088 } RT_INTR;
